title: I'd like to apologize to silver players.
body:
See, I've always thought you guys were really bad, on par with bronze level players. Like I never realized there was a difference between silver and bronze. I figured you all were absolutely trash with no mechanics/decision making skill.


But today. I played with an actual bronze 5 person. And let me tell you . You guys are all ages, ahead of bronze 5.  I don't even understand what could possibly be going through their heads.


This is the bronze 5's actual build path on Sivir. http://puu.sh/tmELC/3245a4a559.jpg

Also heal TP sivir.

I don't know what else to say but to apologize to the silver players I have offended by grouping them with bronze players.
